name: For What It's Worth
description:
Made for the Winter 2021 My First Game Jam! 

For What It's Worth is a short slice of life/romance story about responsible choices in one's attitude towards society, work, and love life. Follow the short story of a college student who grew up with prejudiced parents and how that has the potential to harm her budding interest and relationship with someone else who's already got a slew of stereotypes against her for who she is. 

A modern magical LGBTQIA+ romance with some realities of relationships mixed in the fray.

Programs - TyranoBuilder, CLIP STUDIO Paint.
